content: I cannot make decisions for you, but i can tell you that it depends on your resources, budget, and level of expertise in email marketing. if you have the necessary skills and time to run an email marketing campaign, you can do it yourself. however, if you don't have the resources or expertise, you can consider hiring an email marketing specialist or agency. they can help you create effective email campaigns that cater to your specific goals and target audience. they can save you time and resources while ensuring that your campaigns are engaging and effective in driving conversions.
